sourcesContent:
// Modern Trading App Theme - Inspired by Indian Trading Platforms
export const lightTheme = {
  // Primary Colors
  primary: "#00D4AA", // Green like Groww
  primaryDark: "#00B894",
  secondary: "#6366F1", // Indigo for secondary actions
  
  // Background Colors
  background: "#FFFFFF",
  backgroundSecondary: "#F8FAFC",
  backgroundTertiary: "#F1F5F9",
  
  // Card Colors
  card: "#FFFFFF",
  cardHover: "#F8FAFC",
  cardBorder: "#E2E8F0",
  
  // Text Colors
  textPrimary: "#000000",
  textSecondary: "#000000",
  textTertiary: "#000000",
  textInverse: "#FFFFFF",
  
  // Status Colors
  success: "#10B981", // Green for profits
  successLight: "#D1FAE5",
  danger: "#EF4444", // Red for losses
  dangerLight: "#FEE2E2",
  warning: "#F59E0B",
  warningLight: "#FEF3C7",
  info: "#3B82F6",
  infoLight: "#DBEAFE",
  
  // Chart Colors
  chartGreen: "#00D4AA",
  chartRed: "#EF4444",
  chartBlue: "#3B82F6",
  chartYellow: "#F59E0B",
  
  // Gradients
  gradientPrimary: "linear-gradient(135deg, #00D4AA 0%, #00B894 100%)",
  gradientSecondary: "linear-gradient(135deg, #6366F1 0%, #4F46E5 100%)",
  gradientDark: "linear-gradient(135deg, #1E293B 0%, #334155 100%)",
  
  // Shadows
  shadowSm: "0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)",
  shadowMd: "0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)",
  shadowLg: "0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)",
  shadowXl: "0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)",
  
  // Border Radius
  radiusSm: "4px",
  radiusMd: "8px",
  radiusLg: "12px",
  radiusXl: "16px",
  
  // Spacing
  spacing: {
    xs: "4px",
    sm: "8px",
    md: "16px",
    lg: "24px",
    xl: "32px",
    xxl: "48px"
  }
};

export const darkTheme = {
  // Primary Colors
  primary: "#00D4AA",
  primaryDark: "#00B894",
  secondary: "#6366F1",
  
  // Background Colors
  background: "#0F172A",
  backgroundSecondary: "#1E293B",
  backgroundTertiary: "#334155",
  
  // Card Colors
  card: "#1E293B",
  cardHover: "#334155",
  cardBorder: "#475569",
  
  // Text Colors
  textPrimary: "#000000",
  textSecondary: "#000000",
  textTertiary: "#000000",
  textInverse: "#0F172A",
  
  // Status Colors
  success: "#10B981",
  successLight: "#064E3B",
  danger: "#EF4444",
  dangerLight: "#7F1D1D",
  warning: "#F59E0B",
  warningLight: "#78350F",
  info: "#3B82F6",
  infoLight: "#1E3A8A",
  
  // Chart Colors
  chartGreen: "#00D4AA",
  chartRed: "#EF4444",
  chartBlue: "#3B82F6",
  chartYellow: "#F59E0B",
  
  // Gradients
  gradientPrimary: "linear-gradient(135deg, #00D4AA 0%, #00B894 100%)",
  gradientSecondary: "linear-gradient(135deg, #6366F1 0%, #4F46E5 100%)",
  gradientDark: "linear-gradient(135deg, #1E293B 0%, #334155 100%)",
  
  // Shadows
  shadowSm: "0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
  shadowMd: "0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
  shadowLg: "0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
  shadowXl: "0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
  
  // Border Radius
  radiusSm: "4px",
  radiusMd: "8px",
  radiusLg: "12px",
  radiusXl: "16px",
  
  // Spacing
  spacing: {
    xs: "4px",
    sm: "8px",
    md: "16px",
    lg: "24px",
    xl: "32px",
    xxl: "48px"
  }
};

// Default theme (light)
export const theme = lightTheme;
